actually the quality aint that bad, when you convert it and then convert back to mp3, a little trick i picked up. Needless to say i ve actually purchased the album 3 times because i love this band and each purchase has a bonus track!!
BTW i uploaded We Dont Care At All, for the rest of you guys, New Way to Live is on its way, But i strongly suggest you go out and buy teh music by Alter Bridge, they have been through so much to get this album out, if only you guys knew the half of it!!
